climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 【Plug and Play】Designed for convenience and ease of use, this wireless mouse is truly plug and play. Simply install one AA battery (NOT included) and plug the USB receiver into your computer's USB port, and you're ready to go!

【Reliable and stable connection】Our 2.4GHz Wireless Mouse offers seamless connectivity and instant responsiveness, allowing you to navigate through tasks with precision and efficiency and work freely without the hassle of cables.

【Silent Click】The computer mouse features a unique silent click technology, ensuring the clicks are virtually noiseless, allowing peaceful work without disturbing others, ideal for both office and home use.

【Comfortable Hand-feeling】The 2.4GHz Wireless Mouse fits comfortably in the hand, reducing strain and fatigue during extended use. The ergonomic shape provides a natural grip, providing a focus on the tasks without any discomfort.

【3 Adjustment Levels】Customize the cursor speed through adjustable DPI settings between 1000-1200-1600, whether working on spreadsheets, browsing the web, or gaming, this wireless mouse will ensure smooth and responsive performance.

【Power-saving Design】The wireless mouse automatically enters sleep mode when not in use for a certain period of time. This not only saves energy but extends battery life. Simply move the mouse or click any button to wake it up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why does the mouse doesn't work when I insert the battery? There are two situations: 1. The sensor only flashes once when the battery is inserted causing a misconception that the mouse is defective, but this is a normal situation. 2. Forget to plug into the USB receiver. The mouse has no light up after inserting into the mouse, Does that mean the mouse is defective? It's normal when inserted into the battery but the USB receiver doesn't plug into the laptop. Only when the USB receiver is plugged into the mouse, the sensor will flash all the time. Please refer to the instruction video on the page. Is the mouse controlled by Bluetooth? how does it work? The mouse is controlled by 2.4 GHz wireless so need to plug into the USB receiver which is stored at the back of the mouse, and next to the battery component. If don't plug the USB receiver, the mouse doesn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best mouse I’ve ever had
reviews.reviewText: This pc moose was easy to use and automatically updated to run on my pc. Great price and Best Buy. Feels very good when used very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Portable Mouse!
reviews.reviewText: The OKIMO Wireless Mouse is super easy to set up – just plug in the USB, and you're good to go. It's wireless, so no messy wires, and the mouse fits comfortably in my hand.I love that it's small and easy to carry in my laptop bag. It saves energy, and the battery lasts a long time. Plus, there's a light that tells you when the battery is low.The mouse works really well on different surfaces, and you can change how fast the cursor moves. It's sturdy and feels well-made for the price.In short, if you need a reliable and portable mouse for your laptop that's easy to use and doesn't cost a lot, go for the OKIMO Wireless Mouse. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and does its duty
reviews.reviewText: I just needed and travel friendly mouse and this is 100% easy to use. Feels durable and I can not complain whatsoever especially with the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One glitch but been working great ever since!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse had both good and bad reviews. I decided to take a chance. It worked great on first use but, going back to the computer a couple hours later, it started jumping around all over the screen and opened a link or two I hadn't clicked on. I thought I must have got one of the bad ones I had read reviews about, but I swapped out the battery with a brand new one-I had started with one that had been briefly used, (the battery tester showed it as virtually new though) and it has been working great for the last 2 months! It is not a silent click, but it is quieter than my last mouse. For the price, I would take a chance again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and cute
reviews.reviewText: Could this thing be any cuter? A pink mouse, connects effortlessly, one battery needed and very comfortable in your hand. It “sleeps” to conserve the battery so you don’t have to remember to turn it off. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is smooth and fits perfectly in your hand. I love this is a low click sound so I can use it anywhere and not disturb those in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: This mouse works great so far. The battery life has been good and it is great quality! It is a normal sized mouse, perfect fit for my hand and moves smoothly across the screen. Great product for the money! I also love how quiet it is when clicking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Edited Review due to Excellent Customer Service Response
reviews.reviewText: The bottom review was for the original 2 orders of that model of mouse. Since that review, the company reached out to me and apologized for the defective mice and asked if I would accept a new mouse free of charge to try. I was shocked at their level of professionalism and customer service, as you simply do not get that with most companies any more. I accepted their offer and we have now been using theLED Wireless Mouse, Slim Silent Mouse 2.4G Portable Mobile Optical Office Mouse with USB & Type-c Receiver, 3 Adjustable DPI Levels for Notebook, PC, Laptop, Computer, MacBook and it is working very well.This is my first review of the defective mice:OKIMO Wireless Mouse for Laptop Computer Mouse with USB Receiver 2.4GHz Optical Tracking Computer Cordless Mouse Ergonomic Portable Mouse for PC Mac Laptop Chromebook (Black)________________________________________Cyber Monday Deal-63% $7.99 List Price: $21.49Bought the 1st mouse, it arrived and the cover that goes over the battery kept sliding off. Amazon sent a replacement and had the one I ordered picked up. The replacement arrived, worked the first day, then would not work at all. It appears there is a reason these are on sale…Amazon CS told me they would refund and I did not need to return the 2nd defective mouse – it’s new home is now the trash.It was an extremely cheaply made, plastic mouse. Would not recommend at all. Have used many a mouse over the years, and this was by far the worst one yet.
Excelente cumple su funcion, no hace ruido del click y la pila le dura bastante
For working. Very light to manage. And just found out it is compatible on desktop & MacBook at the same time!
After 4 months of usage the scroll wheel no longer works, poor quality
The mouse stopped working so I thought the battery died. I plugged it for a couple of hours, but the mouse was still unresponsive. It also feels really cheap for a 30$ mouse.
Le diera 5 estrellas si no se despintara la parte de arriba del ratónen cuanto al sonido es bastante silenciosomuy cómodo en la manoque sea recarga ble es genial no tener que comprar baterías
